CRISTALES.SN.summary: CristalerÃ­as de Chile S.A. manufactures and sells glass containers in Chile and internationally. It offers products for wine, beer, spirit, food, and non-alcoholic markets. The company was founded in 1904 and is based in Padre Hurtado, Chile.

EDELPA.SN.summary: Envases del Pacifico S.A. provides packaging solutions in Chile. It offers structures, preformed packaging products, specialty products, and labeling and covers. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
